projects.title: Concrete-mixer
projects.description: ML model that optimizes concrete proportions. Consists of a neural net and a customizable objective function. The NN models the relation between concrete ingredient proportions and properties. The objective function is configured from a GUI to reflect the concrete technologists requirements. The concrete mix is then optimized by using the gradients of the ingredient proportions with regard to the objective function. Made as MVP for entrepreneurship course TIØ4250.

projects.title: Automated market maker w/ lending and leverage
projects.description: Protocol for guaranteeing collateral liquidity for volatile assets using constant product market maker. Developed algorithms and datastructures for opening / closing positions, adjusting liquidity, liquidating positions, swaps, etc.. All algorithms had O(lgn) computational complexity and O(n) storage complexity (or better). Intended for low-cap volatile blockchain assets. Ultimately discontinued after considering economic ramifications, such as who would benefit (rug-pullers), and who would be harmed (naive retail investors). Fun exercise in algorithm design though.

projects.title: Appevent
projects.description: WebApp for organizing and discovering events. Developed in a team of 6 students using Scrum for software development course TDT4140.

projects.title: Cookbook
projects.description: App for creating, sharing and discovering cooking recipes. Developed in team of 4 students using Scrum for software development course IT1901.

projects.title: MinGPT
projects.description: Followed Andrej Karpathy's course on building a generative pretrained transformer from scratch.

projects.title: Sorting algorithms visualisations
projects.description: Built data structure visualisation library and implemented sorting various algorithms (including insertion-sort, quick-sort, merge-sort, heapsort). Done as exam preparation for algorithms and data structures course TDT4120.

projects.title: Neural Net Implementation
projects.description: Implemented neural network for MNIST dataset from scratch in Java. Done as exam preparation for Java / Object Oriented Programming class TDT4140, and Linear Algebra class TMA4115.

projects.title: Ærlig - social app for compliments
projects.description: App to give anonymous compliments to friends. Intended to contribute positively to youths mental health. A reaction to existing social media's negative effects on youth.

projects.title: Lotus Turbo Challenge
projects.description: Recreated lotus turbo challenge racing game. Ray casting for 3d rendering. Bezier curves for generating random infinite roads. Developed with two other students for a highschool IT class.

projects.title: Ray caster 3d engine
projects.description: Created rendering engine that simulates 3d using ray casting. From scratch, no libraries.

projects.title: Ray tracer 3d engine
projects.description: Developed a ray tracing engine in python. Allowed multiple light sources and various shapes. From scratch, no libraries (except displaying pixel data).

projects.title: N-body gravity simulation
projects.description: Simulation of celestial bodies' paths in each other's gravitational fields. Used positions, velocity and mass, but not spin or volume. Used discrete steps. Done as a part of a larger project related to the N-body problem for a high school physics class.

projects.title: Bankbygget Sola website
projects.description: Developed homepage for commercial building. Easy configuration of tenants and available spaces. Served as my introduction to web development.

projects.title: Colin Archer sailing
projects.description: Developed homepage for sailing tour business. Converted to WordPress for easy configuration of text and gallery.

projects.title: Unity games
projects.description: Developed multiple 3d unity games. First game developed during programming summer camp.

projects.title: Minecraft Mod
projects.description: Completed Youth Digital course for minecraft mod development.
